tool_description: This API lets you get the latest data on the trending cryptocurrencies (current value, market cap, and much more) in JSON format
title: Trending Cryptos

api_list.name: Get details for one crypto currency
api_list.description: Get details for one crypto currency
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://trending-cryptos.p.rapidapi.com/coins/{coinid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "trending-cryptos.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Cryptocurrencies List
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://trending-cryptos.p.rapidapi.com/coins"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "trending-cryptos.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
